subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Omar Gonzalez ’s sparkling play over the past four seasons in Major League Soccer has not done much to impress Jurgen Klinsmann, the United States national team coach.
snippet: Omar Gonzalez ’s sparkling play over the past four seasons in Major League Soccer has not done much to impress Jurgen Klinsmann, the United States national team coach.
